00060 /**
00061    ## FUNCTION:
00062         int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00063   
00064    ## SPECIFICATION:
00065         Main program for testing programm.
00066   
00067 */
00068 int main(void)
00069 {
00070         fprintf(stdout, "\n*** TESTING FPOCKET PACKAGE ***\n") ;
00071         int nfailure = check_fparams() ;
00072 
00073         nfailure += check_pdb_reader() ;
00074         nfailure += check_fpocket () ;
00075         
00076         fprintf(stdout, "\n*** TESTING ENDS WITH %d FAILURES ***\n", nfailure) ;
00077         
00078         return (EXIT_SUCCESS) ;
00079 }

00081 int check_qhull(void)
00082 {
00083         fprintf(stdout, "\n--> TESTING QHULL INSTALLATION <--\n") ;
00084         fprintf(stdout, "    IS QVORONOI HERE ............... ") ;
00085         int status = system("qvoronoi > /dev/null") ;
00086         if (status != 0) {
00087                 fprintf(stdout, "NO -> FPOCKET CANNOT BE TESTED\n") ;
00088                 status = 1 ;
00089         }
00090         else{
00091                 fprintf(stdout, "YES\n") ;
00092         }
00093 
00094         return status ;
00095 }

00097 /**
00098    ## FUNCTION:
00099         int check_fpocket(void)
00100 
00101    ## SPECIFICATION:
00102         function to check fpocket correct functionality
00103 
00104 */
00105 int check_fpocket (void)
00106 {
00107         fprintf(stdout, "\n--> TESTING FPOCKET ALGORITHM <--\n") ;
00108         /* Setting parameters*/
00109         int N = 3, i = 0, nfail = 0 ;
00110         char targs[][100] = {"fpocket", "-f", "sample/3LKF.pdb"} ;
00111 
00112         char **args = my_malloc(N*sizeof(char*)) ;
00113         for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++) {
00114                 args[i] = my_malloc(sizeof(char)*strlen(targs[i])) ;
00115                 strcpy(args[i], targs[i]) ;
00116         }
00117 
00118         /* Checking */
00119         fprintf(stdout, "    PARSING COMMAND LINE ........... ") ;
00120         s_fparams *params = get_fpocket_args(N, args) ;
00121         if(!params) {
00122                 fprintf(stdout, "FAILED \n") ;
00123                 return 1 ;
00124         }
00125         fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00126         
00127         fprintf(stdout, "    OPENING PDB FILE................ ") ;
00128         s_pdb *pdb =  rpdb_open(params->pdb_path, NULL, M_DONT_KEEP_LIG) ;
00129 
00130         if(pdb) {
00131                 /* Actual reading of pdb data and then calculation */
00132                         fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00133                         fprintf(stdout, "    READING PDB FILE ............... ") ;
00134                         rpdb_read(pdb, NULL, M_DONT_KEEP_LIG) ;
00135                         fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00136 
00137                         fprintf(stdout, "    RUNNING FPOCKET ................ ") ;
00138                         c_lst_pockets *pockets = search_pocket(pdb, params);
00139                         if(pockets && pockets->n_pockets > 0) {
00140                                 fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00141                                 fprintf(stdout, "    WRITING FPOCKET OUTPUT ......... ") ;
00142                                 write_out_fpocket(pockets, pdb, params->pdb_path);
00143                                 fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00144                                 c_lst_pocket_free(pockets) ;
00145                         }
00146                         else {
00147                                 nfail++ ;
00148                                 fprintf(stdout, "NO POCKET FOUND\n") ;
00149                         }
00150         }
00151         else {
00152                 nfail++ ;
00153                 fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%s) \n", params->pdb_path) ;
00154         }
00155 
00156         for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++) my_free(args[i]) ;
00157         my_free(args) ;
00158         free_fparams(params) ;
00159 
00160         return nfail ;
00161 }

00163 /**
00164    ## FUNCTION:
00165         int check_fparams(void)
00166 
00167    ## SPECIFICATION:
00168         function to check fparams parsing
00169 
00170 */
00171 int check_fparams(void)
00172 {
00173         fprintf(stdout, "\n--> TESTING FPOCKET PARAMETERS <--\n") ;
00174         /* Setting parameters*/
00175         int N = 21 ;
00176         int i ;
00177         char targs[][100] = { "fpocket",
00178                                                 "-f", "sample/3LKF.pdb",
00179                                                 "-m", "3.1",
00180                                                 "-M", "6.1",
00181                                                 "-A", "2",
00182                                                 "-D", "1.5",
00183                                                 "-s", "4.0",
00184                                                 "-n", "5",
00185                                                 "-i", "1000",
00186                                                 "-r", "10.0",
00187                                             "-p", "0.0001"} ;
00188 
00189         char **args = my_malloc(N*sizeof(char*)) ;
00190         for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++) {
00191                 args[i] = my_malloc(sizeof(char)*strlen(targs[i])) ;
00192                 strcpy(args[i], targs[i]) ;
00193         }
00194         /* Checking */
00195 
00196         fprintf(stdout, "    PARSING COMMAND LINE ........... ") ;
00197         s_fparams *params = get_fpocket_args(N, (char**)args) ;
00198         if(!params) {
00199                 fprintf(stdout, "FAILED \n") ;
00200                 return 1 ;
00201         }
00202         fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00203         
00204         int nfails = 0 ;
00205         if(strcmp(args[2], params->pdb_path) == 0)
00206                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM f .................. OK \n") ;
00207         else {
00208                 nfails ++ ;
00209                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM f .................. FAILED \n") ;
00210         }
00211         
00212         if( params->asph_min_size <= atof(args[4])+0.001
00213                 && params->asph_min_size >= atof(args[4])-0.001)
00214                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM m .................. OK \n") ;
00215         else{
00216                 nfails ++ ;
00217                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM m .................. FAILED \n") ;
00218         }
00219 
00220         if( params->asph_max_size <= atof(args[6])+0.001
00221                 && params->asph_max_size >= atof(args[6])-0.001)
00222                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM M .................. OK \n") ;
00223         else{
00224                 nfails ++ ;
00225                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM M .................. FAILED \n") ;
00226         }
00227 
00228         if(atoi(args[8]) == params->min_apol_neigh)
00229                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM A .................. OK \n") ;
00230         else{
00231                 nfails ++ ;
00232                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM A .................. FAILED \n") ;
00233         }
00234 
00235         if( atof(args[10]) <= params->clust_max_dist + 0.001 &&
00236                 atof(args[10]) >= params->clust_max_dist - 0.001)
00237                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM D .................. OK \n") ;
00238         else{
00239                 nfails ++ ;
00240                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM D .................. FAILED \n") ;
00241         }
00242 
00243         if( atof(args[12]) <= params->sl_clust_max_dist + 0.001 &&
00244                 atof(args[12]) >= params->sl_clust_max_dist - 0.001)
00245                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM S .................. OK \n") ;
00246         else{
00247                 nfails ++ ;
00248                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM S .................. FAILED \n") ;
00249         }
00250 
00251         if(atoi(args[14]) == params->sl_clust_min_nneigh)
00252                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM n .................. OK \n") ;
00253         else{
00254                 nfails ++ ;
00255                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM n .................. FAILED \n") ;
00256         }
00257 
00258         if(atoi(args[16]) == params->min_pock_nb_asph)
00259                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM i .................. OK \n") ;
00260         else{
00261                 nfails ++ ;
00262                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM i .................. FAILED \n") ;
00263         }
00264 
00265         if( atof(args[18]) <= params->refine_clust_dist + 0.001 &&
00266                 atof(args[18]) >= params->refine_clust_dist - 0.001)
00267                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM r .................. OK \n") ;
00268         else{
00269                 nfails ++ ;
00270                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM r .................. FAILED \n") ;
00271         }
00272 
00273         if( atof(args[20]) <= params->refine_min_apolar_asphere_prop + 0.001 &&
00274                 atof(args[20]) >= params->refine_min_apolar_asphere_prop - 0.001)
00275                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM p .................. OK \n") ;
00276         else{
00277                 nfails ++ ;
00278                 fprintf(stdout, "    TEST FPARAM p .................. FAILED \n") ;
00279         }
00280         
00281         for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++) my_free(args[i]) ;
00282         my_free(args) ;
00283 
00284         return nfails ;
00285 }

00287 /**
00288    ## FUNCTION:
00289         int check_pdb_reader(void)
00290 
00291    ## SPECIFICATION:
00292         function to check pdb parser
00293 
00294 */
00295 int check_pdb_reader(void)
00296 {
00297         int nfails = 0 ;
00298 
00299         fprintf(stdout, "\n--> TESTING PDB READER  <--\n") ;
00300 
00301         /* Test some routines used by the reader */
00302         nfails += check_is_valid_element() ;
00303 
00304         /* Test several single record cases: */
00305 /*
00306                         "ATOM      1  N  BALA A   1      11.104   6.134  -6.504  1.00  0.00           N  ",
00307                         "ATOM      2  CA  ALA A   1      11.639   6.071  -5.147  1.00  0.00           C-1",
00308                         "ATOM    293 1HG  GLU A   18    -14.861  -4.847   0.361  1.00  0.00           H  ",
00309                         "HETATM 3835 FE   HEM A   1      17.140   3.115  15.066  1.00 14.14          FE  ",
00310                         "HETATM 8238  S   SO4 A2001      10.885 -15.746 -14.404  1.00 47.47           S  ",
00311                         "HETATM 8239  O1  SO4 A2001      11.191 -14.833 -15.531  1.00 50.12           O  "
00312 */
00313 
00314         /*
00315          * FIRST TEST
00316          */
00317 
00318         char test_case1[] = "ATOM      1  N  BALA A   1      11.104   6.134  -6.504  1.00  0.00           N  " ;
00319         test_pdb_line(  test_case1, "ATOM", 1, "N", 'B', 'A', 1, ' ',
00320                                         11.104, 6.134, -6.504, 1.0, 0.0, "N", 0, 1) ;
00321         
00322         char test_case2[] = "ATOM      2  CA  ALA A   1      11.639   6.071  -5.147  1.00  0.00           C-1" ;
00323         test_pdb_line(  test_case2, "ATOM", 2, "CA", ' ', 'A', 1, ' ',
00324                                         11.639, 6.071, -5.147, 1.0, 0.0, "C", -1, 2) ;
00325 
00326         return nfails ;
00327         
00328 }
00329 
00330 /**
00331    ## FUNCTION:
00332         int test_pdb_line(void)
00333 
00334    ## SPECIFICATION:
00335         test pdb line parsing
00336 
00337 */
00338 void test_pdb_line( char test_case[], const char entry[], int id, const char name[],
00339                                         char aloc, char chain, int resid, char insert,
00340                                         float x, float y, float z, float occ, float bfactor,
00341                                     const char symbol[], int charge, int N)
00342 {
00343         /*
00344          * FIRST TEST
00345          */
00346         s_atm *atom = my_calloc(1, sizeof(s_atm)) ;
00347         load_pdb_line(atom, test_case) ;
00348 
00349         fprintf(stdout, "\n    TEST PDB READER (%d) ............ \n", N) ;
00350 
00351         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (ENTRY) ..... ") ;
00352         if(     strcmp(atom->type, entry) == 0) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00353         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%s VS %s)\n", atom->type, entry) ;
00354 
00355 
00356         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (ID) ........ ") ;
00357         if(atom->id == id) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00358         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%d VS %d)\n", atom->id, id) ;
00359 
00360         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (NAME) ...... ") ;
00361         if(strcmp(atom->name, name) == 0) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00362         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%s VS %s)\n", atom->name, name) ;
00363 
00364         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (ALTLOC) .... ") ;
00365         if(atom->pdb_aloc == aloc) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00366         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%c VS %c)\n", atom->pdb_aloc, aloc) ;
00367 
00368         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (CHAIN) ..... ") ;
00369         if(atom->chain[0] == chain) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00370         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%c VS %c)\n", atom->chain[0], chain) ;
00371 
00372         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (RESID) ..... ") ;
00373         if(atom->res_id == resid) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00374         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%d VS %d)\n", atom->res_id , resid) ;
00375 
00376         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (INSERT) .... ") ;
00377         if(atom->pdb_insert == insert) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00378         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%c VS %c)\n", atom->pdb_insert, insert) ;
00379 
00380         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (X) ......... ") ;
00381         if((atom->x < x+0.001 && atom->x > x-0.001)) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00382         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%.2f VS %.2f)\n", atom->x, x) ;
00383 
00384         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (Y) ......... ") ;
00385         if((atom->y < y+0.001 && atom->y > y-0.001)) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00386         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%.2f VS %.2f)\n", atom->y, y) ;
00387 
00388         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (Z) ......... ") ;
00389         if((atom->z < z+0.001 && atom->z > z-0.001)) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00390         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%.2f VS %.2f)\n", atom->z, z) ;
00391 
00392         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (OCCUPANCY) . ") ;
00393         if((atom->occupancy < occ+0.001 && atom->occupancy > occ-0.001)) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00394         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%.2f VS %.2f)\n", atom->occupancy, occ) ;
00395 
00396         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (BFACTOR) ... ") ;
00397         if((atom->bfactor < bfactor+0.001 && atom->bfactor > bfactor-0.001)) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00398         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%.2f VS %.2f)\n", atom->bfactor, bfactor) ;
00399 
00400         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (SYMBOL) .... ") ;
00401         if(strcmp(atom->symbol, symbol) == 0) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00402         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%s VS %s)\n", atom->symbol, symbol) ;
00403 
00404         fprintf(stdout, "      *TEST PDB READER (CHARGE) .... ") ;
00405         if(atom->charge == charge) fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00406         else fprintf(stdout, "FAILED (%d VS %d)\n", atom->charge, charge) ;
00407 
00408         my_free(atom) ;
00409 }
00410 
00411 
00412 void load_pdb_line(s_atm *atom, char *line)
00413 {
00414     int trash;
00415         rpdb_extract_pdb_atom(line, atom->type, &(atom->id),
00416                                                 atom->name, &(atom->pdb_aloc), atom->res_name,
00417                                                 atom->chain, &(atom->res_id), &(atom->pdb_insert),
00418                                                 &(atom->x), &(atom->y), &(atom->z),
00419                                                 &(atom->occupancy), &(atom->bfactor), atom->symbol,
00420                                                 &(atom->charge),&trash) ;
00421 
00422         str_trim(atom->type) ;
00423         str_trim(atom->name) ;
00424         str_trim(atom->chain) ;
00425         str_trim(atom->symbol) ;
00426 }
00427 
00428 int check_is_valid_element(void)
00429 {
00430         int nfails = 0 ;
00431 
00432         /* Testing if the ignore element is taken into account */
00433         fprintf(stdout, "    TEST ELEMENT COMPARATOR (1) .... ") ;
00434         int idx1 = is_valid_element("He", 1) ;
00435         int idx2 = is_valid_element("He", 0) ;
00436         int idx3 = is_valid_element("he", 1) ;
00437         int idx4 = is_valid_element("he", 0) ;
00438         
00439         if(idx1 != 2 || idx2 != 2 || idx3 != 2 || idx4 != -1) {
00440                 nfails ++ ;
00441                 fprintf(stdout, "FAILED \n") ;
00442         }
00443         else fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00444         
00445         /* Testing thje automatic removal of space */
00446         fprintf(stdout, "    TEST ELEMENT COMPARATOR (2) .... ") ;
00447         int idx5 = is_valid_element("Fe  ", 1) ;
00448         int idx6 = is_valid_element("   Fe  ", 1) ;
00449         int idx7 = is_valid_element("  S", 1) ;
00450         int idx8 = is_valid_element("  S ", 1) ;
00451         if(idx5 == -1 || idx6 == -1 || idx7 == -1 || idx8 == -1) {
00452                 nfails ++ ;
00453                 fprintf(stdout, "FAILED \n") ;
00454         }
00455         else fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00456         
00457         /* Testing non valid elements */
00458         fprintf(stdout, "    TEST ELEMENT COMPARATOR (3) .... ") ;
00459         int idx9 = is_valid_element(" sdzqqs ", 1) ;
00460         int idx10 = is_valid_element(" 92 ", 1) ;
00461 
00462         if(idx9 != -1 || idx10 != -1) {
00463                 nfails ++ ;
00464                 fprintf(stdout, "FAILED \n") ;
00465         }
00466         else fprintf(stdout, "OK \n") ;
00467         
00468         return nfails ;
00469 }
